Package game_objects.inventory

Class InventorySlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_objects.inventory.InventorySlot
  • public class InventorySlot
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides object for a single slot in the inventory. It can contain an item or be empty.

      • removeItem

        public boolean removeItem​(Item removedItem)
        Modify the slot to show that an item was removed from the inventory
        Parameters:
        removedItem - Item to be to be decremented in quantity
        Returns:
        true if removed entirely, false if only decremented

      • modifyQuantity

        public void modifyQuantity​(int mod)
        Change quantity of this item by a specified amount
        Parameters:

      • setActionAvailable

        public void setActionAvailable​(boolean tf)
        let this slot know that a crew member is or is not selected
        Parameters:
        tf - True -> show action label. False -> hide action label

      • inventoryOpen

        public boolean inventoryOpen()
        determines whether the inventory is currently open or not
        Returns:
        true -> inventory is open. false -> inventory is not open
